review: Oh man... we love our chromecasts.  We purchased 4 for family at christmas and I have 2 in our home (100% of our TVs).  We have trouble with the app, but this is still a great product. It's a simple solution that should have been resolved years ago. There are other streaming devices, but this is my favorite due to size, easy of installation, and simplification of the product.

review: What a waste of money.  It disconnects all the time, the video quality is terrible when casting from my Galaxy Note 3 to my HDTV.  I get better quality , more consistent streaming from my blu-ray player.  Really can't understand the big fuss.  It would be nice to "cast" my laptop to the big screen but I did that better with an HDMI cable and a Bluetooth keyboard.  Really - why did everyone tell me to get this?
